Title: Design of Resonant Optical Cavities for Ultrasound Detection using Rigorous Electromagnetic Modelling
Source: Annu. Conf. IEEE Photonics Soc., IPC
Abstract: © 2018 IEEE.Detection of very weak ultrasound waves with a Fabry-Perot interferometer has enabled a new range of biomedical applications such as photoacoustic imaging. We propose a realistic model of the optical readout of this device valid for arbitrary focussed readout beams and optical fibre based detection.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
